## Summary of Activity

1. Implemented configurable session settings API enabling dynamic configuration management across the comic-pile ecosystem
2. Completed Dockerization initiative with multi-stage builds, healthcheck endpoints, and PostgreSQL driver integration
3. Launched Task API enhancements including task creation endpoint and review timestamp import API for improved data management
